scripts.dev: set NODE_ENV=development && set DEBUG=er-tracking-node:* && pm2 start ./bin/www --name er-tracking-dev
scripts.dev-linux-pm2: export NODE_ENV=development && export DEBUG=er-tracking-node:* && pm2-runtime start ecosystem.config.js
scripts.prod-linux-pm2: export NODE_ENV=production && export DEBUG=er-tracking-node:* && pm2-runtime start ecosystem.config.js
scripts.prod-pm2: set NODE_ENV=production && set DEBUG=er-tracking-node:* && pm2 start ./bin/www --name er-tracking-dev
scripts.prod-pm2-linux: export NODE_ENV=production && export DEBUG=er-tracking-node:* && pm2 start ./bin/www --name er-tracking-prod
scripts.dev-pm2: set NODE_ENV=development && set DEBUG=er-tracking-node:* && pm2 start ./bin/www --name er-tracking-windows
scripts.dev-linux-forever: export NODE_ENV=development && export DEBUG=er-tracking-node:* && forever start ./bin/www --uid er-tracking --watch --append -l -o out.log -e error.log
